alert.note: Alert for Spokane Area; Upper Columbia Basin (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Air Stagnation Advisory issued November 29 at 12:19PM PST until November 30 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THURSDAY... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Stagnant conditions will have potential to trap pollutants near the ground with deteriorated air quality. * WHERE...Harrington, Fairfield, Wilbur, Grand Coulee, Coulee City, Creston, Airway Heights, Cheney, Downtown Spokane, Spokane Valley, Davenport, Ritzville, Odessa, and Rockford. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Periods of air stagnation can lead to the buildup of pollutants near the surface.
info.instruction: Buildup of fine pollution particles can be harmful to those sensitive to air pollution including people with lung and heart problems, people with diabetes, children and the elderly.
